title: Vinum
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Wine bar & bistro offering several vegetarian and a few vegan suitable items: tapas, salads, platters, pizza, and pasta. This place also incorporates the Fontanella Tea Garden which serves soups and sandwiches, traditional savories (non-veg), salad, pizza, cakes and pastries. The restaurant is enclosed in an old walled garden in the medieval walled town of Mdina (Maltas ancient capital) with amazing views of the island. See website for menus.
